ch.epfl.lasec.mova
Class MovaSecretKey

java.lang.Object
  ch.epfl.lasec.mova.MovaSecretKey

public class MovaSecretKey
extends java.lang.Object

In MOVA the secret key is a secret group homomorphism This class represent a secret key in the MOVA scheme. In this implementation the homomorphism is from (Z/nZ)* -> {-1,+1} with n = pq (p,q are prime) and it is the Legendre symbol (./p)

Author:
Sebastien Duc

getEncoded

public byte[] getEncoded()
Get the signature in its byte encoded form

Returns:

Hom

public YGroupElement Hom(java.math.BigInteger g)
Compute the image of g by the secret homomorphism described by the secret key. In this implementation it is the Legendre symbol of g mod p.

Parameters:
g - The element of which we want to compute Hom(g)
Returns:
Returns the image of g by Hom i.e. Hom(g) = (g / p)

Hom

public YGroupElement[] Hom(java.math.BigInteger[] g)
Compute the image of each element in g by homomorphism
Hom:G->H
where Hom is the Legendre symbol.

Parameters:
g - Set of elements in G
Returns:
{Hom(x): for all x in g}
